name: Healthcare-Diabetes-Prediction For Business Users
description: An analytical app that enables healthcare professionals to create and refine diabetes prediction, driving data-driven patient care and supporting early intervention strategies for better outcomes.

appStages.name: Introduction
Diabetes Prediction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eHealthcare Diabetes Prediction\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eGet  Prediction  using a trained model to generate predictions and insights .\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \r\n      \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003c/section\u003e\r\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html2",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload File",
      "description": "The data should have the columns: Pregnancies, Glucose, BloodPressure, SkinThickness, Insulin, BMI, DiabetesPedigreeFunction, and Age.",
      "customClass": "m-4",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "fileMinSize": "",
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Destination Path",
              "customClass": "m-4",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "data/HEALTHCARE/Healthcare-Diabetes-Prediction/Upload",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "destinationPath",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Upload  File",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "btn-outline  mt-0 float-right rounded m-2",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "upload",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns1",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Features",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "description": "Features used in training the model\r\n",
              "disabled": true,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": {
                "Age": true,
                "Pregnancies": true,
                "Glucose": true,
                "BloodPressure": true,
                "SkinThickness": true,
                "Insulin": true,
                "BMI": true,
                "DiabetesPedigreeFunction": true
              },
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "Age",
                  "value": "Age",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Pregnancies",
                  "value": "Pregnancies",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Glucose",
                  "value": "Glucose",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "BloodPressure",
                  "value": "BloodPressure",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "SkinThickness",
                  "value": "SkinThickness",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Insulin",
                  "value": "Insulin",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "BMI",
                  "value": "BMI",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "DiabetesPedigreeFunction",
                  "value": "DiabetesPedigreeFunction",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "calculateValue": "debugger;\nif(instance.previousData.modelFeaturesData \u0026\u0026 data.model){\n  featureData \u003d instance.previousData.modelFeaturesData.filter(res\u003d\u003e{\n    if(res.name \u003d\u003d data.model \u0026\u0026 res.path \u003d\u003d data.model) {\n        return res;\n    }\n  });\n  value \u003d featureData[0].features;\n}",
              "key": "selectBoxes",
              "type": "selectboxes",
              "input": true,
              "inputType": "checkbox"
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Model name",
              "placeholder": "Use only alphanumeric and underscore",
              "description": "Enter Name of Trained Model\r\n",
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "M1",
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "model",
              "properties": {
                "isMlName": "true",
                "isMlPath": "true"
              },
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],

          "offset": 0,

          "currentWidth": 6
